title: Using a date-modified header to detect unique visitors without using cookies
dot:
digraph UniqueVisits{graph[fontname="Helvetica", fontsize=10, rankdir=TB, layout=dot, bgcolor="#f9f9f9"];node[shape=rectangle, style=filled, fillcolor="#e6e6e6", fontname="Helvetica", fontsize=10, color="#cccccc"];edge[color="#999999", arrowhead=vee];TraditionalMethod[label="Traditional Method
- Uses cookies to store UID
- Tracks return visits" fillcolor="#cce5ff"];PrivacyConcerns[label="Privacy Concerns
- UID can link data points
- Potential to reveal identity" fillcolor="#ffcccc"];NewSolution[label="New Solution
- No database or server storage
- Uses 'Cache-Control: no-cache' and 'last-modified' headers" fillcolor="#ccffcc"];VisitCounting[label="Visit Counting
- Encodes visit count in date
- Uses 'last-modified' header" fillcolor="#ccffcc"];BounceCounting[label="Counting Bounces
- Assumes unique visit is a bounce
- Adjusts counter on second request" fillcolor="#ccffcc"];Benefits[label="Benefits
- Great for privacy
- No cookies or UIDs
- Compliant with privacy laws" fillcolor="#cce5ff"];TraditionalMethod->PrivacyConcerns;PrivacyConcerns->NewSolution;NewSolution->VisitCounting;VisitCounting->BounceCounting;BounceCounting->Benefits;}

title: At SpaceX, work was taken away from me in case I “might retire or die.”
dot: digraph G{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box, style=rounded, fontname="Arial", fontsize=12];edge[color=black, fontname="Arial", fontsize=10];subgraph cluster_0{label="John Johnson's Experience at SpaceX";fontname="Arial";fontsize=14;color=lightblue;style=filled;"Hired at 58"->"Excited to contribute"[label="Deep expertise in optics engineering"];"Excited to contribute"->"Hardcore work ethic"[label="Long hours, high performance"];"Hardcore work ethic"->"Performance Reviews"[label="Positive feedback"];"Performance Reviews"->"Roles Transferred"[label="Gradual reassignment to younger engineers"];"Roles Transferred"->"Age Discrimination Allegations"[label="Suspected age discrimination"];"Age Discrimination Allegations"->"HR Response"[label="Misunderstandings, no action"];"HR Response"->"Resignation"[label="Pushed out, no work"];}subgraph cluster_1{label="SpaceX Culture";fontname="Arial";fontsize=14;color=lightcoral;style=filled;"Musk's 'Hardcore' Expectations"->"Younger Workforce"[label="Male-dominant youth culture"];"Younger Workforce"->"Marginalization of Older Engineers"[label="Quiet firing, role reduction"];"Marginalization of Older Engineers"->"Age Discrimination"[label="Legal concerns"];}"Hired at 58"->"Musk's 'Hardcore' Expectations"[style=dashed, color=gray];"Resignation"->"Age Discrimination"[style=dashed, color=gray];}
